scripts.build:integration-tests: pnpm package && pnpm -C integration-tests add -D 'file://../project/anev-ts-mountebank-1.8.2.tgz' && pnpm -C integration-tests build && pnpm -C integration-tests remove @anev/ts-mountebank
scripts.integration-tests-local: pnpm package && pnpm -C integration-tests add -D 'file://../project/anev-ts-mountebank-1.8.2.tgz' && pnpm -C integration-tests test-local && pnpm -C integration-tests remove @anev/ts-mountebank
scripts.integration-tests-ci: pnpm package && pnpm -C integration-tests add -D 'file://../project/anev-ts-mountebank-1.8.2.tgz' && pnpm -C integration-tests test-ci && pnpm -C integration-tests remove @anev/ts-mountebank
